feed.title: Life Is A Song
feed.subtitle: 與其低頭去找尋，不如抬頭看風景。

entry.title: Dec 2014 – Jun 2016 Work Summary
entry.content:
Jan 2016 to Jun 2016


Android Development: WiGadget for CES 2016 Las Vegas Demo

  • Upgrade WiGadget for CES 2016 Demo
    • Added SimpleConfig feature: connect Ameba RTL8195 IoT Board to Internet with WiGadget
    • Add PM2.5 / PM10 support on WiGadget: Use WiGadget to get PM2.5 / PM10 values from Ameba RTL8195 IoT Board


Android Development: MyCloud for Android Phones/Tablets

  • Get & update Xively cloud database from Android devices for Ameba RTL8195 IoT Board
  • Generic UI for Xively


iOS Development: MyCloud for iPhone & iPad

  • Get & update Xively cloud database from iOS devices for Ameba RTL8195 IoT Board
  • Generic UI for Xively


Embedded System Development: Ameba RTL8195 IoT Board

  • Port AllSeen Alliance AllJoyn Framework to Ameba RTL8195 SDK
  • Provide AllJoyn Basic Client-Service Example on Ameba
  • Provide AllJoyn Bus Property Example on Ameba and Android devices


Research Study: Ameba RTL8195 IoT Board Mesh Network

  • IEEE 802.11s mesh network research & study for Ameba RTL8195 IoT Board


Jun 2015 to Dec 2015


Embedded System Development: Ameba RTL8195 IoT Board & SDK

  • SPI examples verification & related documentations


iOS Development: WiGadget for iPhone & iPad

  • Ameba RTL8195 device discovery through through Zero-configuration networking
  • Local link connection between Ameba RTL8195 and smart phone with socket
  • Cloud link connection between Ameba RTL8195 and smart phone with Firebase
  • SHTC1 support on WiGadget: Use WiGadget to get temperature & humidity value from Ameba RTL8195 IoT Board


Dec 2014 to Jun 2015


Embedded System Development: Ameba RTL8195 IoT Board & SDK

  • I2C examples verification & related documentations
  • Ameba RTL8195 SDK SHTC1 sensor example: get temperature & humidity value from SHTC1 sensor


Android Development: WiGadget for Android Phones/Tablets

  • Ameba RTL8195 device discovery through through Zero-configuration networking
  • Local link connection between Ameba RTL8195 and smart phone via socket
  • Cloud link connection between Ameba RTL8195 and smart phone via Firebase
  • SHTC1 support on WiGadget: Use WiGadget to get temperature & humidity value from Ameba RTL8195 IoT Board
entry.summary:
Jan 2016 to Jun 2016


Android Development: WiGadget for CES 2016 Las Vegas Demo
